title: Marcus Gabilheri

projects.desc: Winning submission for the Oklahoma State App Contest in Spring 2016. Uses geofences to alert users of pets reported lost nearby.

description: I am a Computer Science Student at Oklahoma State University living in Stillwater, Oklahoma. I am currently working as a Full Stack developer for the Plants & Soil Sciences Department at Oklahoma State University.
During my college career I have participated and won 1st place in the Oklahoma State University App Contest 3 years in a row

I'm also the founder and organizer of the Google Developers Group OSU Stillwater (GDG OSU) chapter. GDG activies involve planning and running events to expose students to a variety of topics. During the previous 3 years I have taught and coached many students on how to build their 1st Android application and developed a variety of tutorials that can be found on my github page.
When I'm not in class or working I really enjoy developing mobile apps, playing with my pets, hanging out with my wife and cooking.
